title: AIMO LLM Service Analysis Output
description: Schema for LLM-generated service classification results

usage_type.description: Primary usage classification for enterprise monitoring

risk_level.description: Risk level for enterprise data security

category.description: Service category (e.g., Collaboration, Storage, GenAI, DevTools)

rationale_short.description: Brief explanation for the classification decision

fs_uc_code.description: FS-UC code (Taxonomyセット). Use empty string if unknown.

dt_code.description: DT code (Taxonomyセット). Use empty string if unknown.

ch_code.description: CH code (Taxonomyセット). Use empty string if unknown.

im_code.description: IM code (Taxonomyセット). Use empty string if unknown.

rs_code.description: RS code (Taxonomyセット). Use empty string if unknown.

ob_code.description: OB code (Taxonomyセット). Use empty string if unknown.

ev_code.description: EV code (Taxonomyセット). Use empty string if unknown.

taxonomy_version.description: Taxonomy version used for classification (Taxonomyセット)

suggested_domains.description: Optional: related domains that should share this classification

is_ai_service.description: Whether this service has AI/ML capabilities that process user data
